DataElement.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Baseline Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information captured while conducting research on a product. EXAMPLE(S): An electrical problem in a device. Specifies whether the result is a starting point to which other results may be compared.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Product Investigation Performed Observation Outcome Baseline Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A starting point to which things may be compared.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The act or process of a systematic and thorough examination; research, study; the process of inquiring into or following up, intended to develop facts.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval.  mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
